notifications.title: New Feature: Custom Time Intervals
notifications.message: You can now set custom time intervals for auto wallpaper changes! Choose any duration from 1 minute to 24 hours.

notifications.title: Happy New Year!
notifications.message: Thank you for using ManiX in 2024! We have exciting new features planned for 2025. Stay tuned!

notifications.title: Performance Update
notifications.message: We've optimized the wallpaper loading system for faster performance and better offline support.

notifications.title: New Wallpaper Collection Added
notifications.message: We've added 50+ stunning new wallpapers to our collection! Check them out in the wallpaper settings.

notifications.title: Browser Compatibility Update
notifications.message: ManiX now supports the latest versions of Chrome, Firefox, and Edge browsers with improved performance.

notifications.title: Custom Shortcuts Feature
notifications.message: You can now create custom shortcuts with your own icons and organize them into categories!

notifications.title: Maintenance Notice
notifications.message: Scheduled maintenance on December 1st, 2024. Some features may be temporarily unavailable.
